Text: what a treasure, truly admire and greatly appreciate your work, johnefp!!!

This is a rip of the Criterion release. The image quality is utterly awesome, very crispy and clear, obviously a lot of work went into restoring the print. The sound is quite good, as good as it can be, given the age of the source material.
About the film there is nothing much to say, it's a true classic which should not be missed.
Wonderful torrent. Thanks a lot, johnefp.
thanks for this and for the quality axo666 talked about
